main event: A witness observed a pulsating red light that suddenly disappeared during a UFO sighting in Vandalia, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and 20 seconds., The object displayed erratic flight before changing course rapidly., The object was observed to be disc-shaped, with a diameter of about 10-15 feet., The weather conditions were cloudy at the time of the observation., The object emitted no sound during the sighting.
witness description: individual who filled out the questionnaire
